targets.description: Group registration config - prevents unauthorized group access
Global agent instructions shared across all groups

notes: Mode 'restore': Auto-restore file to approved baseline on drift + alert user
Mode 'alert': Alert user about drift but do not auto-restore
Mode 'ignore': No monitoring, file changes are expected
Patterns use glob syntax with ** for recursive matching
